        public static long readLongWithVaryingBytesBE(InputStream in,
                                              int numBytes)
                                       throws IOException
        Read long with varying bytes length
        Parameters:
        in - InputStream to read from
        numBytes - number of bytes to read to make integral value from [0, 8]
        Returns:
        Integral value, which is composed of numBytes bytes, read using big-endian rules from in
        Throws:
        IOException - error reading input stream.

      • convertByteCharSequenceToByteArray

        public static byte[] convertByteCharSequenceToByteArray(CharSequence string)
        When converting between String chars and bytes, there's an implied encoding to be used, dependent on the context and platform. If none is specified, then String(byte[]) will use the platform's default encoding. This method is for when encoding is not relevant, when the String simply holds byte values in each char.

        LiteralStringObject HexStringObject

        Parameters:
        string - char sequence to convert to byte array.
        Returns:
        byte array of input string, encoding untouched.

      • convertByteArrayToByteString

        public static String convertByteArrayToByteString(byte[] bytes)
        When converting between String chars and bytes, there's an implied encoding to be used, dependent on the context and platform. If none is specified, then String(byte[]) will use the platform's default encoding. This method is for when encoding is not relevant, when the String simply holds byte values in each char. LiteralStringObject HexStringObject
        Parameters:
        bytes - to convert.
        Returns:
        converted bytes

      • convertStringObject

        public static String convertStringObject(Library library,
                                         StringObject stringObject)
        Utility method for decrypting a String object found in a dictionary as a plaing text. The string can be encrypted as well as octal encoded, which is handle by this method.
        Parameters:
        library - document library used for encryption handling.
        stringObject - string object to convert to string
        Returns:
        converted string.

      • convertStringToOctal

        public static String convertStringToOctal(String literalString)
        Convert a utf-8 encoded string into into an octal enocded byte[] array.
        Parameters:
        literalString - string to convert.
        Returns:
        converted string value.
